item.title: Khen Rinpoche Sonam Gyatso’s Completion of 2018 Middle Way Teaching Program
item.description: On December 19th at the conclusion of numerous teachings on the Middle way given by Khen Rinpoche Sonam Gyatso to the Sapan and Rangri College students, Rinpoche announced the annual exam results and concluded the year’s teaching program.
